WHILE (TRUE)
  BLUROK.ATTACK(BRAWLER)
  QERBI.ATTACK(BRAWLER)
  BLUROK.ATTACK(BRAWLER)
  BLUROK.ATTACK(CASTER)
  QERBI.ATTACK(CASTER)
  BLUROK.ATTACK(CASTER)
  BLUROK.ATTACK(RANGER)
  QERBI.ATTACK(RANGER)
  BLUROK.ATTACK(RANGER)
  BLUROK.ATTACK(HEALER)
  QERBI.ATTACK(HEALER)
  BLUROK.ATTACK(HEALER)
END
